participant_1.background:
I am not sure of my ethnic background, but I love pepperoni pizza!
I'm not a big fan of fortune tellers, but I do enjoy Starbucks and Halloween.
i can t eat shrimp.
I don't like sports, but I like to watch my brother play.
i like gardening.

participant_2.background:
I went to a comedy club in a new city and laughed so hard that I cried.
I met a lot of new people at the welding classes I've been taking.
I'm lucky to have a family that supports me and my hobbies, even if they don't understand them.
i miss my dad.
I am single because my time is devoted to rescuing animals.

content.text: I'm good, just got done with a welding class, how are you?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking! What did you make at welding class?
I made a metal wall art piece for my living room, I'm really proud of it!
That's so cool! I love welding, it's so creative. What other hobbies do you have?
I also love going to the comedy club, it's so much fun to laugh!
That's a great hobby! I've never been to a comedy club before, but I've always wanted to go.
You should definitely check out a comedy club sometime, it's so much fun!
I will! Thanks for the recommendation!
No problem! So what do you like to do for fun?
I love to garden, it's so relaxing and rewarding.
That's such a cool hobby! I've always wanted to learn how to garden, but I've never had the time.
It's not too hard to get started, and it's really rewarding!
I'll have to look into it!
